PD calibration

nearpdf.Rd

PD calibration

nearpdf(cormatrix, pda.method, lmin)

Arguments

cormatrix

input cormatrix
pda.method

"nearpd" or FALSE
lmin

min threshold of eigenvalues

Value

Examples

x = matrix(rnorm(100), ncol = 10)
nearpdf(cor(x), pda.method = "nearpd", lmin = 0.1)

#> $cormatrix.pd
